description:
A practical and lightweight boot for hiking, Ascent Evo GTX is ideal for mountain hiking and trekking enthusiasts seeking a boot which provides reliable performance on a range of terrain types.

A cemented-construction boot that ensures great stability, as well as delivering excellent precision during foot placement thanks to the Intruder sole unit.

The lasted construction with Gore-Tex Extended Comfort upper ensures excellent waterproofing and breathability, to ensure outstanding climate comfort.
name: Kayland - R.O.I. Recreation Outfitters Inc. Ascent Evo GTX - Mens
